Package org.assertj.swing.listener

Event listeners.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventDispatchThreadedEventListener
    AWT event listener that ensures all events are handled on the event dispatch thread (EDT.)
    WeakEventListener
    Event listener that wraps a given AWTEventListener and: attaches itself to the default toolkit dispatches any given event to the wrapped listener removes itself from the default toolkit when the wrapped listener gets garbage-collected

Package org.assertj.swing.listener Description

Event listeners.

Most of the classes of in this packages were adapted from Abbot. Many thanks to Timothy Wall for allowing us to use them.

Author:
Alex Ruiz
